thread.title: Karen Matthew’s paedo ex ‘attacked after found near Yorkshire school’
thread.title_full: Karen Matthew’s paedo ex ‘attacked after found near Yorkshire school’

title: Karen Matthew’s paedo ex ‘attacked after found near Yorkshire school’
text:
GETTY TARGET: Craig Meehan, former boyfriend of Karen Matthews and stepdad of Shannon 
Craig Meehan moved to Heckmondwike, West Yorks., after his ex-girlfriend Karen Matthews was jailed for kidnapping and falsely imprisoning her own daughter, Shannon. 
Meehan was convicted of possessing child porn after police searched his computer while investigating Matthews. 
An angry dad attacked the 30-year-old after he was found living just feet from Heckmondwike Primary School, the Sun reports. 
GETTY ODD COUPLE: Meehan was dating Matthews when Shannon disappeared “He was an idiot for thinking he could live around here” A parent 
Shannon, of Dewsbury, West Yorks. – who was nine when mum Karen reported her missing – was found drugged and tethered at Meehan’s uncle Michael Donovan’s flat, in nearby Batley Carr. 
Donovan and Matthews had planned to collect reward money offered for finding her – but their plot was uncovered and they were jailed. 
Meehan had nothing to do with her disappearance – but was sentenced to 20 weeks in jail after being found guilty of viewing sick child abuse images on the web. 
GETTY MOST HATED: Matthews has been given a new identity 
Authorities have already rehoused him around West Yorks. several times after he was recognised and hounded out of town. 
Locals have expressed outrage the registered sex offender had moved so close young pupils. 
GETTY UNLE: Meehan's uncle, Michael Donovan, hid Shannon for Karen 
A parent told the Sun: “It is crazy that he was put so close to a school. 
“I know he’s got to live somewhere but he is well-known around here so you think he’d go somewhere out of the way. 
“One of the dads who has kids at the school grabbed him in the street and belted him and told him to get gone. And that’s what he did. 
“He was an idiot for thinking he could live around here and not be recognised.” 
GETTY KIDNAP: A poster appealing for information to help find Shannon Matthews 
She has reportedly demanded plastic surgery to protect her from abuse in the street. Related articles
